meanings.sent1: The lemonade was the tangiest drink I ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: The orange was tangiest when it was freshly picked.
meanings.sent3: The tangiest salsa made my brother's eyes water.
meanings.sent4: The tangiest chili in town had everyone talking.
meanings.sent5: The tangiest vinegar made my mouth pucker with sourness.

meanings.definition: Most intense in flavor or aroma
meanings.sent1: The tangiest cheese left a strong taste in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: The spices in the curry made it the tangiest dish on the menu.
meanings.sent3: The tangiest perfume made people turn their heads.
meanings.sent4: The tangiest memory of summer lingered in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The tangiest coffee woke me up instantly with its bold flavor.
